Flow.description: This Flow will add Products to the Opportunity basing on value in "DR_Product_Type__c" field. This has entire logic on Primary Product, Primary SUMS Product, Secondary Product and Secondary Product SUMS. Enhanced final screen message.
Flow.label: Deal Registration : FL: Convert DR Products

fields.name: DRProgramTypeisNULL
fields.fieldText: Program Type of this Opportunity is NULL. Please enter a valid value in order to add Products.

fields.name: FinalSuccessMessage
fields.fieldText: Products are added Successfully. Please refresh the page in order to see the newly added Products.

fields.name: PrimaryProductNullZeroOutputMessage
fields.fieldText: Primary Product of this Opportunity is NULL. Please enter a valid value in order to add Products.

fields.name: PrimaryProductQuantityisNullZeroDisplayMessage
fields.fieldText: Primary Product Quantity of this Opportunity is either Null/Zero. Please enter a valid value in order to add Products.

fields.name: PrimaryProductMatchingProductIsNotFoundDisplayMessage
fields.fieldText: Unable to copy products onto the opportunity. Please log a case for further support.

variables.description: This has the value of field "DR_Program_type__c"
variables.name: DR_Program_Type

variables.description: This variable will have all exisitng OpportunityLineItems
variables.name: existingOLIsToDelete

variables.description: This is the Id of the Source Opportunity
variables.name: OpportunityId

variables.description: This variable contains the Product record that matched with the Opportunity Primary Product.

variables.description: This object maintains all field values of the Opportunity
variables.name: OpportunitySObjVar

variables.description: This has the "Opp Reg EDU Pricebook" record details
